Package Extbase\Validation

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Validation_Error Objects of this kind contain a list of validation errors which occurred during validation.
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Exception A generic validation exception
Tx_Extbase_Validation_PropertyError This object holds validation errors for one property.
Tx_Extbase_Validation_ValidatorResolver Validator resolver to automatically find a appropriate validator for a given subject
